United Nations General Assembly Resolution 31/72, The Convention on the Prohibition of Military or Any Other Hostile Use of Environmental Modification Techniques has been opened for voting.
Shall we receive notifications when nations decide their vote on the current UN Resolution undergoing a vote?\nThese can be turned off at any time by an international decision.
UN Environmental Modification Convention Fails Vote

United Nations General Assembly Resolution 31/72, The Convention on the Prohibition of Military or Any Other Hostile Use of Environmental Modification Techniques, has been defeated by vote in the United Nations General Assembly.
UN Environmental Modification Convention Passes Vote

United Nations General Assembly Resolution 31/72, The Convention on the Prohibition of Military or Any Other Hostile Use of Environmental Modification Techniques, has passed its vote in the United Nations General Assembly.

We have the opportunity to vote on United Nations General Assembly Resolution 31/72, The Convention on the Prohibition of Military or Any Other Hostile Use of Environmental Modification Techniques, at the UN General Assembly.\nWe can either vote For it, Abstain, or vote Against it.
We have ratified the UN Environmental Modification Convention.
Withdrawal from the Environmental Modification Convention
We have withdrawn from the UN Environmental Modification Convention.
